charges.charge_description: 18:13 TRAFFIC OFFENSES by an habitual offender driving with a suspended license in violation of SC Code 56-1-1020 &; 1100. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Probation for period of Three (3) Years with following special conditions: (1) reside at Alston Wilkes Halfway House for period of six (6) months; (2) participate in alcohol/durg abuse treatment program at direction of probation office; and (3) perform 50 hours of community service at direction of probation office. Special Assessment in amount of $50.00. (1)
